Dingbats

Here are some graphics buttons and icons to use in the manuals. If you want to use other such "dingbats" in your manual, plase add them to doc/images and to this page. That way we can assure a more consistent look of our manuals.

Warnings and Notifications

 These are most easil;y produced using the WARNING and NOTICE tags.
Use the large or small version whichever looks best in your context.
